item.title: Megan add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Megan add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Megan add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Megan add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Megan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Megan add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Megan add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Megan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
Megan add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Megan add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Megan add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Megan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Megan add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: Megan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Megan add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Megan add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "There is more treasure in books than in all the pirates' loot on Treasure Island and best of all, you can enjoy these riches every day of your life." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Megan add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "It's kind of fun to do the impossible." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Megan add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "Laughter is timeless. Imagination has no age. And dreams are forever." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Megan add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "Our greatest national resource is the minds of our children." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Megan add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "Do I love you? My God, if your love were a grain of sand, mine would be a universe of beaches." -- William Goldman
